meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or astonishment.
meanings.sent2: Oh crickey, I can't believe my eyes!
meanings.sent3: Crickey, I almost spilled my drink in shock!
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunder made me shout, 'Crickey!'
meanings.sent5: Crickey, the magician's trick left everyone amazed!

meanings.definition: An exclamation of shock or disbelief.
meanings.sent1: Crickey! Is that really a UFO?
meanings.sent2: Wow, crickey, I never thought I'd see that!
meanings.sent3: Crickey, I thought I saw a ghost in the mirror!
meanings.sent4: The news of the treasure hunt made everyone shout, 'Crickey!'
meanings.sent5: Crickey, the surprise party left me speechless!
